text: Jisu taikhan ke koise, “Kile mane tumikhan laga biswas komti thaka nimite. Moi hosa pora tumikhan ke koi ase, jodi tumikhan sorso dana nisena hoilebi biswas thakile, tumikhan etu pahar ke kobo, ‘Yate pora hati kene ta te jabi,’ aru etu hati jabo, aru tumikhan nimite eku bhi napara kaam nohobo.
